name: haproxy
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Installs haproxy and prepares the configuration location.

= REQUIREMENTS:

== Platform:

Tested on Ubuntu 8.10.

== Cookbooks:

= ATTRIBUTES: 

No haproxy-specific attributes are used.

= USAGE:

Update the haproxy.cfg file with listener(s) for your sites/servers.
